text: Mid-State Correctional Facility is a New Jersey Department of Corrections state prison for juvenile offenders, located in Wrightstown, New Jersey on the grounds of Fort Dix. The facility opened in 1982. In September 2016, the prison was "closed for renovation". Mid-State was scheduled to re-open in January 2017 as a specialized licensed drug treatment and detention center, with a capacity of 696. In April 2017, the facility re-opened. The facility now serves as a "treatment prison" for inmates, who can enroll in treatment programs that are state-certified. ==References== Category:Prisons in New Jersey Category:Buildings and structures in Burlington County, New Jersey Category:Wrightstown, New Jersey Category:1982 establishments in New Jersey
title: Mid-State Correctional Facility (New Jersey)
